headline.main: Step One to Fighting Ebola? Start with Corruption

docs.abstract: Here in Rwanda, no one has ever put a hand out to me for a bribe – not once in the near decade I’ve lived here. That lack of hemorrhaging is what will enable us to stop Ebola here.
docs.snippet: Here in Rwanda, no one has ever put a hand out to me for a bribe – not once in the near decade I’ve lived here. That lack of hemorrhaging is what will enable us to stop Ebola here.

docs.lead_paragraph: UnitedHealth Group's third-quarter earnings inched up 2 percent but that was enough to help the nation's largest health insurer trump Wall Street expectations and raise its 2014 forecast for the first time this year.

docs.lead_paragraph: The city of Detroit, with financial help from the state, plans to demolish the home of the Detroit Red Wings and give the land to a creditor for development as part of a major settlement in the city's bankruptcy case, lawyers said Thursday.

headline.main: Detroit Gives Arena Land to Creditor in Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Detroit Gives Arena Land to Creditor in Bankruptcy

docs.lead_paragraph: An unpopular Mitch McConnell seems preferable to an Alison Lundergan Grimes if she’s in the party of President Obama.

headline.seo: Alison Lundergan Grimes and Mitch McConnell Take On the White House
headline.main: In Kentucky’s Senate Race, a Democrat Runs Away From Obama
headline.print_headline: In Kentucky’s Senate Race, a Democrat Runs Away From Obama

docs.abstract: Juliet Lapidos Editorial Observer notes in Kentucky's senate race, Alison Lundergan Grimes, Democratic challenger to Republican Sen Mitch McConnell, is running away from Pres Obama and spends more time attacking his policies than defending them; observes she is self-described Clintonian and it is not surprising she trails in most polls.
docs.snippet: An unpopular Mitch McConnell seems preferable to an Alison Lundergan Grimes if she’s in the party of President Obama.

docs.lead_paragraph: Officials said consumers should update information on their income and family size and should compare their current insurance with alternatives, which could offer better coverage at a lower cost.

headline.main: U.S. Says Consumers Must Renew Health Insurance Policies
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Consumers Must Renew Policies

docs.abstract: Obama administration begins notifying consumers they should return to federal health insurance marketplace to renew coverage for 2015; say consumers should update information on their income and family size and should compare their current insurance with alternatives, which could offer better coverage at a lower cost.
docs.snippet: Officials said consumers should update information on their income and family size and should compare their current insurance with alternatives, which could offer better coverage at a lower cost.

docs.lead_paragraph: The announcement of the tablets, which are expected to have significant upgrades, is coming as sales have slowed and competition has toughened.

headline.main: Apple to Unveil New iPads, as Rivals Gain Ground
headline.print_headline: Apple Set to Unveil New iPads, as Rivals Are Gaining Ground

docs.abstract: Apple is set to unveil new iPads as well as major revision of iPad Air; unveiling will occur even as Apple faces tougher competition from tablets made by other companies, raising question of whether upgrades can reverse that trend.
docs.snippet: The announcement of the tablets, which are expected to have significant upgrades, is coming as sales have slowed and competition has toughened.
